<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs=""
>
[Arcane Sensitivity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2195) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Edgewatch Detective](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=85)

**Prerequisites**
[Edgewatch Detective Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2193)

</column>

---

You can sense the presence of the supernatural, even if you don't have any magical ability yourself. You can spend a single action (this action has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait) to determine if any magical auras are present in the area. This has the effects of a 1st-level [_detect magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) spell but isn't magical. By straining, you can also discover the source of the magic and its school (with the effect of a 4th-level _detect magic_ spell), but doing so prevents you from using this ability again until you've rested for 8 hours.
name: Arcane Sensitivity
